titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: EMPLOYEE RESIDENCY STATUS - Description

body.p: EMPLOYEE RESIDENCY STATUS is the same as attribute EMPLOYEE RESIDENCY STATUS .
The Electronic_Staff_Record will hold the residency status classifications as advised by the Immigration and Nationality Department (IND).

EMPLOYEE RESIDENCY STATUS was previously collected in the Medical and Dental Workforce Census but is no longer a required item. Its use for all staff is recommended, however, as it is extremely helpful in planning for replacement of staff without permanent rights of residence in the United Kingdom.
